body_html: Adding automated tests on 4 billion+ elements to our suite seems as likely to cause problems as detect them. Maybe it's worth adding a separate test suite just for these sorts of large cases.
body_text: Adding automated tests on 4 billion+ elements to our suite seems as likely to cause problems as detect them. Maybe it's worth adding a separate test suite just for these sorts of large cases.
body: Adding automated tests on 4 billion+ elements to our suite seems as likely to cause problems as detect them. Maybe it's worth adding a separate test suite just for these sorts of large cases.
